name: @ntindle/openclaw-tasks
description: Persistent task and plan tracking plugin for OpenClaw

scripts.release: npm whoami && bun run ci && npm version patch && npm publish --access public && git push && git push --tags && gh release create $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) --generate-notes
scripts.release:minor: npm whoami && bun run ci && npm version minor && npm publish --access public && git push && git push --tags && gh release create $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) --generate-notes
scripts.release:major: npm whoami && bun run ci && npm version major && npm publish --access public && git push && git push --tags && gh release create $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) --generate-notes

author: ntindle
